cast.name: 谢尔盖·格罗布琴科 Sergey Gorobchenko
安纳斯塔西娅·韦登斯卡娅 Anastasiya Vedenskaya
阿克辛娅·奥莱尼克 Aksinya Oleynik

introduction: In one of the county-level Russian villages, the people greeted the charming young bride, the master, with honors, while he stayed in the city. Everyone, young and old, is struck by her beauty and charming courtesy. And yet, something lurks in the bright appearance of this pretty girl. There is something hidden and enslaving in it. Only one person can not be tempted, not fall into temptation before her tricks - the one whom everyone believes is out of this world ... In the battle of dark and light forces the city beauty and the blessed rural Ivan will converge. The future of all villagers will depend on the outcome of this fight ...
